dcterms:creator: Y. Liang
G. Huang
Z. Zhao
dcterms:description: The data consists of the pick-up and drop-off time and station of each Citi Bike trip records. During the study period, there are around 36 thousand trip records per day. The dataset includes 246 BSS stations for demand prediction.
dcterms:title: NYC Citi Bike

dcterms:creator: Y. Liang
G. Huang
Z. Zhao
dcterms:description: The data contains the entries and exits counts of each turnstile in subway stations every four hours, with around 2.4 million entry/exist counts every day on average. The dataset includes 107 subway stations.
dcterms:title: NYC Subway

dcterms:creator: Y. Liang
G. Huang
Z. Zhao
dcterms:description: The dataset contains the pick-up and drop-off time and zone of each trip record from for-hire vehicles (FHV) in NYC, provided by ride-hailing companies such as Uber and Lyft. On average, there are 234 thousand trips per day during the study period, with 63 TLC zones in Manhattan.
dcterms:title: NYC Ride-hailing
